short_summary: A fully enclosed, digital workshop lathe is needed
description: machine shop operations will require an increase in the accuracy, size, and complexity of the machined parts and an increased safety.
full_summary:
==================

* **Digital Workshop Lathe Tender**
================================

Details of the Tender
----------------------

* **Reference Number** : cb-768-80871665
* **Amendment Number** : 5
* **Solicitation Number** : 23-58077Z (Version B)
* **Publication Date** : 2024-02-05
* **Tender Closing Date** : 2024-02-28T14:00:00
* **AMendment Date** : 2024-02-28

Overview of the Solicitation
-----------------------------

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) requests proposals from qualified contractors for the supply of a fully enclosed, digital workshop lathe for the Saguenay site. This new equipment will enable increased accuracy, size, and complexity of machined parts, while improving safety.

Eligibility
------------

Eligible bidders include private domestic businesses that are incorporated in Canada. The NRC encourages the participation of Suppliers that are certified Indigenous or Common-Law Business Enterprises.

Contracting Details
-------------------

The procurement will be opened and competitive, with the lowest price being the selection criterion.

Related Trade Agreements
-------------------------

A Free Trade Agreement circumstance exist involving this solicitation (as outlined in Section 4. - International Agreements) and takes precedence over other Government of Canada trade agreements.

Target Delivery
-----------------

Deliveries will be accepted to the NRC site located in Saguenay, Quebec. Other options or alternative delivery arrangements may not be considered.

Contracting Entity Information
-----------------------------

* **Contracting Entity** : National Research Council Canada (NRC)
